name: obsidian-fvp
description: This is a plugin for Obsidian providing utils for working with FVP system of Mark Forster. For more see http://markforster.squarespace.com/blog/2021/11/16/the-final-version-perfected-fvp-instructions-reposted.html

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Krzysztof Platis
